title: House for sale walpola
details:
Location near to Lake side, 3 km to kandana town , 3 km to ragama, less than 1km to Walpola railway station..
2.5 km to De Mazonad college , 2 km to OKI International School and 2 km to All Nation International School. 2km to Battuwatta. good residential area. No Brokers.
